title: Apigee - Hybrid administration overview
abstract:
# Apigee - Hybrid administration overview
You are currently viewing version 1.1 of the Apigee hybrid documentation. **This version is end of life.** You should upgrade to a newer version. For more information, see [Supported versions](/apigee/docs/hybrid/supported-platforms#supported-versions) .
This section describes common tasks that you perform during operation and administration of your Apigee hybrid cluster. These tasks include:
| Section | Section.1   | Description                                            |
|:-----------|:-------------------|:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| data_usage | Data collection | Describes the primary types of data: metrics, logs, analytics, and deployment status. This section also describes how the data are collected and how you can access the collected data. |
| apps  | Runtime services | Explains how to manage the hybrid runtime plane components running in your cluster.                          |
| settings | Cluster management | Explains how to configure multi-region clusters, scale services, configure environments, and perform other administration tasks.
